casebody.data:
Jeffery WHITEHURST, Petitioner-Appellant
v.
ALEXANDER COUNTY, Alexander County Planning and Zoning Board of Adjustment and William Sipes, Respondents-Appellees. No. COA15-265. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Feb. 2, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed; Remanded for Correction of Clerical Error.
